name: Sweet Frozen Soda: Carnival Happy Tiny Treats Free Game
name_original: Sweet Frozen Soda: Carnival Happy Tiny Treats Free Game
description:
Oh my, it’s so hot, hot, hot! The summer heat is sizzling over the sidewalks and your skin.

With one step outside, it hits you and makes you want to run for the air conditioner inside!

What can do you to beat this yucky summer heat? Treat yourself to an ice cold frozen treat!
